title: Verify Order History Display
objective: To verify that users can view their complete order history with accurate information
preconditions: User is logged into the platform
User has at least 5 orders in different statuses
Order data is properly seeded in test database

test_steps.action: Click on 'Order History' or 'My Orders' link
test_steps.expected_result: Order history page loads displaying list of orders

test_steps.action: Verify orders are sorted by date (most recent first)
test_steps.expected_result: Orders appear in descending chronological order

test_steps.action: Verify each order displays: Order number, Date, Total amount, Status
test_steps.expected_result: All orders show required information in list view

test_steps.action: Verify status badges display correctly (e.g., 'Delivered' in green, 'Cancelled' in red)
test_steps.expected_result: Status indicators are color-coded and easily distinguishable

test_steps.action: Click on an order to view details
Verify order details include: Items with images, Quantities, Prices, Shipping address, Payment method, Order timeline
test_steps.expected_result: All order information is displayed accurately

test_steps.action: For a shipped order, verify tracking information is displayed
test_steps.expected_result: Tracking number and carrier displayed with 'Track Shipment' link
PDF invoice downloads with correct order information

test_steps.action: Return to order list and test pagination (if more than 10 orders)
test_steps.expected_result: Pagination works correctly, displays correct orders per page

notes: Test with various order statuses. Ensure real-time status updates are reflected.
